text:
Our SVG looks different (however worked in 1.5.1)... We use a desc tag on the 
same level as the element it refers to:

<g>
<rect id="03D00106285AD0054100" x="10720"  y="140"  width="25" height="40" 
class="stllusinit" />
<desc>MRBW RW 001 039.490  HR 	L	 1    A</desc>
</g>

We have the 'problem' since 1.6.

creator: deweese@apache.org
text:
This is now fixed in SVN.
We now search up the DOM tree to check if any parent element's have 
desc or title's associated with them.
